description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record.  The CLM_VALUES_2 table holds claim-level values set by the system during claims processing or by user edits.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim values record.

columns.name: ADMSN_TYP
columns.description: The admission type for the claim.

columns.name: ADMSN_SRC
columns.description: The admission source for the claim.

columns.name: DISCHRG_DISP
columns.description: The patient's discharge status, also referred to as the discharge disposition.

columns.name: RFL_NUM
columns.description: The referral number for the claim.

columns.name: AUTH_NUM
columns.description: The prior authorization number for the claim.

columns.name: SPEC_PROG_IND
columns.description: The indicator that the services on the claim were rendered under one of a list of special programs.

columns.name: CLM_DELAY_RSN
columns.description: The reason code explaining why the claim was submitted after the payer's normal filing deadline.

columns.name: AUTH_EXCEPT_CD
columns.description: The code explaining why services that normally need authorization were performed without the necessary authorization.

columns.name: PAT_AMT_PAID
columns.description: The amount already paid by the patient.

columns.name: PAT_AMT_DUE
columns.description: The amount estimated to be the patient's responsibility.

columns.name: AUTO_ACDNT_STATE
columns.description: The state in which an automobile accident occurred.

columns.name: AUTO_ACDNT_CNTRY
columns.description: The country in which an automobile accident occurred. It is only populated when the accident occurred outside the United States.

columns.name: MAMM_CERT_NUM
columns.description: The provider's certification number when the claim contains mammography services.

columns.name: CLIA_NUM
columns.description: The Clinical Laboratory Improvement Amendment (CLIA) number when the claim contains lab services.

columns.name: DEMO_PRJ_ID
columns.description: The identifier for claims billed under atypical rules (e.g., pilot programs, clinical trials).

columns.name: SPINAL_MAN_COND_CD
columns.description: The patient's condition when the claim contains chiropractic services.

columns.name: EPSDT_CERT_APPLIES
columns.description: The indicator that identifies whether an Early and Periodic Screening, Diagnostic, and Treatment (EPSDT) referral was given to the patient.

columns.name: ORTHO_TOT_MO
columns.description: The total number of months of orthodontic treatment.

columns.name: ORTHO_MO_REMAIN
columns.description: The number of months of orthodontic treatment remaining for a transfer patient.

columns.name: ADMSN_DX_QUAL
columns.description: The qualifier that identifies the code set for the admission diagnosis for the claim.

columns.name: ADMSN_DX
columns.description: The admission diagnosis for the claim.

columns.name: DRG
columns.description: The Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) determined for the claim.

columns.name: ANES_SURG_PROC
columns.description: The HCPCS code of the surgical procedure performed under anesthesia when the code needs to be reported on the anesthesia claim.

columns.name: OUTSIDE_LAB
columns.description: The indicator that the claim includes purchased services rendered by an independent provider.

columns.name: OUTSIDE_LAB_CHG
columns.description: The price of the purchased services.

columns.name: CLM_FROM_DT
columns.description: The earliest date represented on the claim. This date could be the minimum service date for an outpatient or professional claim or the admission date for an inpatient claim.

columns.name: CLM_TO_DT
columns.description: The latest date represented on the claim. This date could be the maximum service date for an outpatient or professional claim or the discharge date for an inpatient claim.

columns.name: ADMSN_DT
columns.description: The admission date on the claim. For outpatient claims, this date represents the visit or start of care date.

columns.name: ADMSN_TM
columns.description: The time at which the patient was admitted to the facility. This time is only available for institutional claims.  Note that the value is the exact time, including both the hour and minutes.

columns.name: DISCHG_DT
columns.description: The discharge date on the claim.

columns.name: DISCHG_TM
columns.description: The time at which the patient was discharged. This time is only available for institutional claims.  Note that the value is the exact time, including both the hour and minutes.

columns.name: ILL_INJ_DT
columns.description: The date in which the patient was injured or when the current illness was first noticed.

columns.name: INIT_TREAT_DT
columns.description: The initial treatment date when the claim represents a series of visits (e.g., physical therapy, spinal manipulation, dialysis, pregnancy).

columns.name: LST_SEEN_DT
columns.description: The date the patient was last seen by the attending or supervising provider.

columns.name: ACUTE_MANIF_DT
columns.description: The date acute symptoms first manifested.

columns.name: ACDNT_DT
columns.description: The date the automobile accident occurred.

columns.name: LMP_DT
columns.description: The date of the last menstrual period.

columns.name: LST_XRAY_DT
columns.description: The date of the last X-Ray.

columns.name: HEAR_VIS_RX_DT
columns.description: The date on which the prescription was written for hearing devices or vision frames and lenses.

columns.name: DISAB_START_DT
columns.description: The earliest date on which the patient was disabled and could not work.

columns.name: DISAB_END_DT
columns.description: The latest date on which the patient was disabled and could not work.

columns.name: LST_WK_DT
columns.description: The last date on which the patient was able to perform his or her duties at work.

columns.name: AUTH_RETURN_WK_DT
columns.description: The date on which the patient can return to work.

columns.name: ASSUM_CARE_DT
columns.description: The date on which care was assumed by another provider during post-operative care.

columns.name: RELINQ_CARE_DT
columns.description: The date on which the provider of the claim ceased post-operative care.

columns.name: ORTHO_BAND_DT
columns.description: The date orthodontic appliances were placed.

columns.name: DENT_SRV_DT
columns.description: The date on which dental services were performed.

columns.name: SIMILAR_ILL_DT
columns.description: The earliest date on which symptoms of the same or similar illness were noticed.

columns.name: AMB_PAT_WT
columns.description: The patient's weight (in pounds) when the patient is transported by an ambulance.

columns.name: AMB_TRANS_RSN_CD
columns.description: The code explaining why the patient was transported by ambulance.

columns.name: AMB_TRANS_DIST
columns.description: The distance (in miles) the patient was transported.

columns.name: AMB_RND_TRIP_DESC
columns.description: The note explaining the need for round trip transportation.

columns.name: AMB_STRETCHER_DESC
columns.description: The note explaining the need for a stretcher.

columns.name: CNTRCT_TYP
columns.description: The code representing the type of contract between the provider and the payer.

columns.name: CNTRCT_AMT
columns.description: The amount assigned by the contract between the provider and the payer.

columns.name: CNTRCT_PCT
columns.description: The contract percentage for the claim assigned by the contract between the provider and the payer.

columns.name: CNTRCT_CD
columns.description: The code representing the claim type under the contract between the provider and the payer.

columns.name: CNTRCT_DISCNT_PCT
columns.description: The discount percentage assigned by the contract between the provider and the payer.

columns.name: CNTRCT_VERS_ID
columns.description: The version of the contract used on the claim.

columns.name: ATT_PROV_NAM_LAST
columns.description: The attending provider's last name.

columns.name: ATT_PROV_NAM_FIRST
columns.description: The attending provider's first name.

columns.name: ATT_PROV_NAM_MID
columns.description: The attending provider's middle name.

columns.name: ATT_PROV_NAM_SUF
columns.description: The suffix to the attending provider's name (e.g., Jr, III).

columns.name: ATT_PROV_NPI
columns.description: The attending provider's National Provider Identifier (NPI).

columns.name: ATT_PROV_TAXONOMY
columns.description: The attending provider's taxonomy code.

columns.name: OPER_PROV_NAM_LAST
columns.description: The operating provider's last name.

columns.name: OPER_PROV_NAM_FIRST
columns.description: The operating provider's first name.

columns.name: OPER_PROV_NAM_MID
columns.description: The operating provider's middle name.

columns.name: OPER_PROV_NAM_SUF
columns.description: The suffix to the operating provider's name (e.g., Jr, III).

columns.name: OPER_PROV_NPI
columns.description: The operating provider's National Provider Identifier (NPI).

columns.name: OTH_PROV_NAM_LAST
columns.description: The other operating provider's last name.

columns.name: OTH_PROV_NAM_FIRST
columns.description: The other operating provider's first name.

columns.name: OTH_PROV_NAM_MID
columns.description: The other operating provider's middle name.

columns.name: OTH_PROV_NAM_SUF
columns.description: The suffix to the other operating provider's name (e.g., Jr, III).

columns.name: OTH_PROV_NPI
columns.description: The other operating provider's National Provider Identifier (NPI).

columns.name: REND_PROV_TYP
columns.description: The rendering provider on the claim is a person or a non-person.

columns.name: REND_PROV_NAM_LAST
columns.description: The rendering provider's last name (if a person) or the organization name (if a non-person).

columns.name: REND_PROV_NAM_FIRST
columns.description: The rendering provider's first name. It is only populated when the provider is a person.

columns.name: REND_PROV_NAM_MID
columns.description: The rendering provider's middle name. It is only populated when the provider is a person.

columns.name: REND_PROV_NAM_SUF
columns.description: The suffix to the rendering provider's name (e.g., Jr, III). It is only populated when the provider is a person.

columns.name: REND_PROV_NPI
columns.description: The rendering provider's National Provider Identifier (NPI).

columns.name: REND_PROV_TAXONOMY
columns.description: The rendering provider's taxonomy code.

columns.name: REF_PROV_NAM_LAST
columns.description: The referring provider's last name.

columns.name: REF_PROV_NAM_FIRST
columns.description: The referring provider's first name.

columns.name: REF_PROV_NAM_MID
columns.description: The referring provider's middle name.

columns.name: REF_PROV_NAM_SUF
columns.description: The suffix to the referring provider's name (e.g., Jr, III).

columns.name: REF_PROV_NPI
columns.description: The referring provider's National Provider Identifier (NPI).

columns.name: REF_PROV_TAXONOMY
columns.description: The referring provider's taxonomy code.

columns.name: SUP_PROV_NAM_LAST
columns.description: The supervising provider's last name.

columns.name: SUP_PROV_NAM_FIRST
columns.description: The supervising provider's first name.

columns.name: SUP_PROV_NAM_MID
columns.description: The supervising provider's middle name.

columns.name: SUP_PROV_NAM_SUF
columns.description: The suffix to the supervising provider's name (e.g., Jr, III).

columns.name: SUP_PROV_NPI
columns.description: The supervising provider's National Provider Identifier (NPI).

columns.name: ASST_SURG_NAM_LAST
columns.description: The assistant dental surgeon's last name.

columns.name: ASST_SURG_NAM_FIRST
columns.description: The assistant dental surgeon's first name.

columns.name: ASST_SURG_NAM_MID
columns.description: The assistant dental surgeon's middle name.
